room_title: Escape room "Neon Escape" by Break Free Escape Room in Houston
review: Lots of Fun! The owners are so friendly and accommodating.  We did both rooms and had a Blast!Tougher than we expected!  Highly recommend if you are looking for family/friends fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Neon Escape" by Break Free Escape Room in Houston
review: Overall great room and experience! The props and clues were well done.The game master volunteered too many clues even when we had plenty of time remaining near the end. Rather than simply telling the answer we would have preferred the game master prompt us in the right direction. I would def recommend this company/room. At the beginning before you start you should discuss w the game master about how many clues you want and how direct you want them to be.

room_title: Escape room "Neon Escape" by Break Free Escape Room in Houston
review: We had a group of teens that had a great time. Was even told that they escaped like no other group had ever done before!
